subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ Brad Richards returned from a two-game absence, but the Senators’ Jacob Silfverberg broke a 2-2 tie, helping end the Rangers’ four-game winning streak.
snippet: The Rangers’ Brad Richards returned from a two-game absence, but the Senators’ Jacob Silfverberg broke a 2-2 tie, helping end the Rangers’ four-game winning streak.
